params.contentId: The content ID for which rights are being delegated.
params.grantee: The address of the account or contract to delegate rights to.

params.contentId: The content ID for which rights are being revoked.
params.grantee: The address of the account or contract to revoke rights to.

grantRights(address,uint256).notice: Delegates rights for a specific content ID to a grantee.

revokeRights(address,uint256).notice: Revokes the delegation of rights for a grantee.
